attributes.action: A vote of No Confidence in Prime Minister Thersa May
attributes.additional_details:
Through your slience, you have allied yourself with Donald Trump's highly missinformed and dangerous 'Anti-Muslim' immigration policy, playing directly into the hands of terrorist ideology, and putting the lives of The People in this country at unacceptable risk. 

In light of this, we The People call on our elected MP's to pass a motion of "No Confidence" in Theresa May's ability to lead this country.

https://www.icct.nl/download/file/A-Schmid-Al-Qaedas-Single-Narrative-January-2014.pdf
attributes.background: Prime Minister Theresa May, through failing to denounce the racist, sexist and homophobic policies of Donald Trump, you have turned your back on the British values of Tolerance, Equality and Fair Treatment; and in so doing, you have turned your back on The People you were chosen to represent.
